name: NGHBRHD: The tiny city-building game
description:
Park or factory? Office or apartment building? Choose what to build, where to build it, and see how your NGHBRHD develops.

As you build, keep an eye on the stats to see how your neighbours are getting around, how much green space everyone has, and the jobs-housing balance.

To start the game, unzip the package and open `index.html` in your browser.
